Blog.post: Last night some teenagers were vantilizing the neighborhood. They are probably at this time at home laughing about it. WOW how retarted is that? I mean come on. Only little kids vandilize people's homes and propertys. But I guess they are little kids since they do that kind of stuff. Oh well, I'll walk out there a little later and see if anyone needs any help with anything. Well I need to go get ready for the cookout today. Laterz!
He's sooo cute, Gotta urlLink go play with him!!

Today was fun, Hung out with Bennie all day. Rachelle went to work right before church was over so I didn't get to talk to her much. Made fun of Bennie's watermellon shaped head. HEHEHE. Tomorrow is the cook out for Papa's retirement and for mamorial day! WOOT! Meaning no school. Well gotta go have fun reading this.

I have relatives in North Carolina that have no intentions of telling me anything at all. First, 3 weeks after they call me and tell me that my grandad had died! Thanks appreciated the soon news! Second, we call down there saying we were going to come down and see granny, and they decide that she doesn't want us to see her in that "state". Yeah right and pigs fly! Now yesterday I find out that my granny died, and of course they haven't called to inform us! We had to find out about it on the internet. What great relatives I've got. They don't even care enough to tell me stuff. I REALLY APPRECIATE IT EVERYONE! Well, I hope I never have to talk to them again. The only people down there that really cared was granny and papa slone.Well everyone else can go screw themselves I never want to see them again.

Today is such a boring day! There is absolutely nothing to do. Rea thanks for going shopping with me! I would have been lost in what to get if it wasn't for you! Love ya gurly! Well if anyone wants to do something next week or Sunday afternoon give me a halla! And ya'll know the number. Well laterz!
Type whatever publish post. Then view!

YEY! Only one more day of school till I am out for the summer. Well I've had a pretty good year. And made a lot of new friends everyone best be keeping intouch with me over the summer. I mean my friends are important. Well most are. HEHE! Well I'll be buisy this summer but if someone wants to come over or do something with me just give me a halla at my email (Flirtyangil@comcast.net) or Call me. And ya'll should know that number. LAterz!
urlLink Snoopy Dog Grad is so cool he's dropped by to share the day with you.

Gerald is leaving me for a whole week. It really sucks. He is going to Brady Saunders to camp for BoyScouts. I am going to miss him. Thankfully his dad is going to take me to go see him at the end of the week. Yeah!!
You are the only you there will ever be so make yourself known!!!

My Next Thirty Years I think I’ll take a moment, celebrate my age The ending of an era and the turning of a page Now it’s time to focus in on where I go from here Lord have mercy on my next thirty years Hey my next thirty years I’m gonna have some fun Try to forget about all the crazy things I’ve done Maybe now I’ve conquered all my adolescent fears And I’ll do it better in my next thirty years My next thirty years I’m gonna settle all the scores Cry a little less, laugh a little more Find a world of happiness without the hate and fear Figure out just what I’m doing here In my next thirty years Oh my next thirty years, I’m gonna watch my weight Eat a few more salads and not stay up so late Drink a little lemonade and not so many beers Maybe I’ll remember my next thirty years My next thirty years will be the best years of my life Raise a little family and hang out with my wife Spend precious moments with the ones that I hold dear Make up for lost time here, in my next thirty years In my next thirty years

I can read your mind and I know your story I see what you're going through, yeah It's an uphill climb and I'm feeling sorry But I know it will come to you, yeah Don't surrender 'Cause you can win In this thing called love When you want it the most there's no easy way out When you're ready to go and your heart's left in doubt Don't give up on your faith Love comes to those who believe it And that's the way it is When you question me For a simple answer I don't know what to say, no But it's plain to see, if you stick together You're gonna find the way, yeah So don't surrender 'Cause you can win In this thing called love When you want it the most there's no easy way out When you're ready to go and your heart's left in doubt Don't give up on your faith Love comes to those who believe it And that's the way it is That's the way it is When life is empty With no tomorrow And loneliness starts to call Baby don't worry, forget your sorrow 'Cause love's gonna conquer it all All... When you want it the most there's no easy way out When you're ready to go and your heart's left in doubt Don't give up on your faith Love comes to those who believe it And that's the way it is Ooh Don't give up on your faith Love comes to those who believe it And that's the way it is That's the way it is Don't give up on your faith Love comes to those who believe it And that's the way it is

Hello all, my names Kit Carson of course. LOL. Here are some of my interests. I love GOD, CHURCH,MUSIC,COUNTRY MUSIC,KENNY CHESNEY, TIM MCGRAW, TOBY KEITH, RASCAL FLATTS, SARA EVANS, TERI CLARK, & SHANIA TWAIN. I'm really into hockey. I love the Richmond Riverdogs. In the NHL I like the Washington Capitals. And football I like the Redskins.
Everyone has a list of problems and issues. But I'm #1 on everyones list.

Friendship is like the breeze, You can't hold it, Smell it, Taste it, Or know when it's coming, But you can always feel it, And you'll always know it's there, It may come and then go, But you can know it'll always be back. - Terri Fanning -

Hey, Dad, look at me Think back, and talk to me Did I grow up according to plan? And do you think I'm wasting my time Doing things I wanna do? But it hurts when you disapproved all along And now I try hard to make it I just wanna make you proud I'm never gonna be good enough for You can't pretend that I'm alright And you can't change me [Chorus] ‘Cause we lost it all Nothin' lasts forever I'm sorry I can't be perfect Now it's just too late And we can't go back I'm sorry I can't be perfect [Verse 2] I try not to think About the pain I feel inside Did you know you used to be my hero? All the days you spent with me Now seem so far away And it feels like you don't care any more And now I try hard to make it I just wanna make you proud I'm never gonna be good enough for you I can't stand another fight And nothing's all right [Chorus] ‘Cause we lost it all And nothin' lasts forever I'm sorry I can't be perfect Now it's just too late And we can't go back I'm sorry I can't be perfect [Bridge] Nothing's gonna change the things that you said And nothing's gonna make this right again Please don't turn your back I can't believe it's hard just to talk to you But you don't understand [Chorus (2x)] ‘Cause we lost it all And nothin' lasts forever I'm sorry I can't be perfect Now it's just too late And we can't go back I'm sorry I can't be perfect This song is for my Dad. I hope he reads it one day.

Hey Hey everyone! It's Tuesday! WOW! This week is going by pretty slow! WOOT! That means that Band camp is farther away! Rachelle boo! Remember that there is Country Fest. The 17th and you need to see if you are going to be able to go! Ok? Well anyways! Love ya'll Laterz! XOXO! PS: When all else fails look CUTE!
*I do it because I can* *I can because I want to* *I want to because you said I couldn't*
We could all take a lesson from crayons: some are sharp, some are beautiful, some have weird names, all are different colors, but they still learn to live in the same box

Hey everyone, I need something to do next week. I have absolutly no band practice or anything happening at all so I will need something to do. So give me a yell if you wanna do something ya'll know the number Laterz!!

This mornin I woke up, out my swimsuit on for work, then went to Hardees for breakfast. That was very good. Then I went to work. Did some vacuming and skimming, then came home early and had to help mom cut grass. Then came inside and took a shower. That felt so good. After that I ate pizza for dinner. Then I watched Full House and 7th Heaven. I love those shows. Thats all for now.

Welcome to my new website. Thanks to Danielle who helped me out. Such a good friend to have. My interests are God,music,hockey,sports, country music, swimmin, hangin out with friends, goin to Riverdogs hockey games. Singin in chorus. Thats about it. Talk to yall later. Love, Carson

Pretty much same as yesterday. I woke up, washed my face and hands. Then I put my swimsuit on and headed to Hardees this mornin for breakfast and ate a bacon,egg,and cheese biscuit, then I headed off to work. It rained some during my shift, but it was fun swimmin in the rain durin work since nobody was there. Then it cleared off. After I got off work it was so nice that I stayed and swam until 5:30. After that I came home and took ashower. Then I talked to friends online. I got inturrupted by dinner, but of course I didnt mind. Thats all for now, have a great evening. Love always. Carson

This mornin I got up at 7:00, washed my face, brushed my teeth, got dressed, then went to breakfast at Chick-Fil-A. That was very good. After that I went to bowling. I was mediocre, I got a 101,122, and 147. After that I went to work, we had a daycare today. They behaved ok, better than normal. after work I stayed and swam with friends. After that I came home, took a shower, ate pizza for dinner and now I'm on here. Now I gotta go outside and put H2O in the birdbath. Have a great day. Love, Carson

This mornin I woke up at 7:00. I seem to wake up the last few days at that time for some unknown reason. I turned the tv on and watched Saved By The Bell. I used to watch show every mornin when I was in elementary and middle school. Then I got up and washed my fdace and brushed my teeth and got on here, talked with friends for a lil while, then got dressed and went to breakfast. Of course I went to Hardees. Then I had to go to the bowling alley to ride with James and jessica to pick out the trophies for bowling. I actually got to make the choices. I felt special. Anyway, after we got done there we went back to the center and mom picked me up. Mom went to Wal Mart while I was with Jessica and James, while she was there she bought me the new Joe Nichols "Revelation" CD. I would highly recommend it to anyone. All of the songs are awesome. Then of course she had to go to Dollar Tree, she loves that store way too much. Then as my luck would have it, we got stuck in there because it started pouring down rain. I wasnt very happy to say the least. Then we came home and I ate a cheeseburger for lunch. Then I got back on here and am doin pretty good. Ohh yeah one more thing, it rained so I didnt have to go to work. HALLELUJAH. ROFL. Yall have a great afternoon. Love, Carson

This mornin I woke up at 7 again , why does my brain make me get up then. Anyway I got up, came in comp. room and watched Saved By The Bell. After that about 9 or so I went to Shoneys for breakfast with my mom. Dad was supposed to join us, long story. Then we went to Barnes & Noble and I got some very good chocolate frozen type of coffee yeah, whatever its called. Then we went to Wal Mart and of course I had to see someone I knew cause I had that chocolate stuff all in my teeth. I ran into Danielle and her bf Ben. Luckily she didnt notice, dk about Ben though. Great seeing them. Then I came home and helped mom with the grass. Now I'm on here. Have a great evening. Love, Carson
REDSKINS WIN with a 39 yard field goal kick with 3 seconds to go to win the game for the Skins. Have a great night. 20-17 final score. love Carson

Today was kinda my relazing day. I did a lot of thinking about my life. Where it's going and where I want it to go. Then I watched the Redskins game tonight. Denver Broncos tied it with 1:26 to go. Not good news, anyway ttyl. Have a great night. Love Carson

This mornin I had to get up at 8, mom called the house @ 6:30 to wake dad up, so needless to say I wasnt very happy. Anyway I got up, brushed teeth, got dressed and went to Hardees for breakfast of course. Then I got to work around 8:45. Daycare came at 10 and didnt behave very well. I got off at 2 and of course as soon as I was about to get in it started raining. So I just got out and came home. I came home and got in the shower and now I'm watchin Pastor John Hagee then Pastor Rod Parsley. Dont know what I'll do after that, probably wait for full House to come on at 6. Anyway have a great afternoon. Love Carson
